Posted By: metalevolence (4/14/2011 9:11:30 PM)

posts.post_content:
@Blkphoenix88  
this is not Yugi, there are not chains here xD but anyways you cannot do it since [Fireball](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fireball) is a sorcery, and the 0 life would kill you before you can cast even a [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt)  
  
@Superllama  
and i think you would need less cards and have a higher chance of success with just Channel and [Fireball](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fireball)  
  
chances of getting a swamp, a forest, a gemstone caverns, a dark ritual, a emrakul, a channel and a triumph of the hordes are far lower than getting a black lotus, a mountain, a channel and a fireball  
  
your combo = 7 cards  
classic combo = 4 cards

Posted By: Salient (5/28/2012 5:32:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I'm amazed nobody has mentioned [Children of Korlis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Children of Korlis), or [Dawnglow Infusion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dawnglow Infusion). Popping either with channel will get you 19 mana with full life, or get you up to 39 life, or you can do both to get up to 77 life that can be turned into mana for the rest of the turn, easily popping your [Spawnsire of Ulamog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spawnsire of Ulamog) on turn 2, or even 1 if you are lucky and have the right ramsp. My most competetive deck uses this combo. Also, you can use [tainted sigil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=tainted sigil) if you are going tricolor. You're welcome  
  
5/5
posts.html:

Popping either with channel will get you 19 mana with full life, or get you up to 39 life, or you can do both to get up to 77 life that can be turned into mana for the rest of the turn, easily popping your Spawnsire of Ulamog on turn 2, or even 1 if you are lucky and have the right ramsp. My most competetive deck uses this combo. Also, you can use tainted sigil if you are going tricolor. You're welcome

5/5

posts.post_content:
In addition to everything else mentioned, now you can activate your Dark Ascension fateful hour cards like [Thraben Doomsayer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thraben Doomsayer) at will.   
  
Also, powering out a pair or trio of [Lodestone Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lodestone Golem)s could stop your opponents from casting anything meaningful for the rest of the game while you smash their faces with a comfortable life cushion.
posts.html:
